item.title: How to use the new soft-inpainting feature in AUTOMATIC1111 WebUI
item.description: Soft Inpainting Guide: How we make our Tutorial Images Before After If there’s a visible division between the inpainted area and the rest of your image using normal inpainting, we can fix this with the new Soft inpainting feature.

item.title: Basic inpainting guide
item.description: What Is Inpainting?Inpainting is the process of modifying parts of an image with AI. You can alter images as subtly or as drastically as you like, correct mistakes, and take your pictures to a new level.

item.title: Guide to use Inpainting in AUTOMATIC1111 WebUI by RoiD1kan
item.description: DISCLAIMERThis guide only details the methods I have been using for inpainting over the months and what is working for me.
